alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 20 at 10:06AM HST until December 20 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS THROUGH 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR ALL HAWAIIAN ISLANDS THROUGH 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the Big Island Hawaii. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to drive, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Big Island Interior; Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast
